relation: DJ Hall breaks school record with 13 catches (185 yards, 2 TD)
Kenneth Darby carries 20 times for 145 yards and a TD
Tyrone Prothro catches 5 passes for 134 yards and two TDs
Ray Hudson runs for 116 yards on 14 carries with two TDs
99 yards each for Hudson, Darby; Prothro breaks 100-yard KO return
Brodie Croyle connects on 9 of 14 passes for 183 yards and three TDs
Santonio Beard rushes 13 times for 138 yards and five TDs
Gerald Dixon returns fumble 66 yards to open a 7-0 Alabama lead
Tyler Watts throws 15 of 21 for 176 yards, adds 55 yards on ground
Shaud Williams runs 16 for 131; Sam Collins adds 115 rec. yards

textBeforeTable: The Sunday Rewind, we'll define a blowout as a margin of 20 points or more. So without further delay, below is a look at Alabama's last 10 wins by 20 points or more against SEC teams. The Alabama football team forged a rout in conference play Saturday against rival Tennessee, 41-17, and for a team that has made a habit of close final scores, it was indeed a rarity. The Crimson Tide briefly trailed 14-10 early in the game, but then responded with a 31-3 run to turn a game that is normally a nail-biter into a laugher. So where are the real hammers in Alabama's recent history? For purposes of Rammer Jammer Hammers Alabama 41, Tennessee 17: D.J. Hall - 13 catches, 185 yards, 2 TDs  John Parker Wilson - 32 of 46, 365 yards, 3 TDs, 0 INTs.  Terry Grant - 26 carries, 104 yards, TD rush, TD catch.  Kareem Jackson - 2 INTs.  Leigh Tiffin - 4 of 5 on FGs. The Sunday Rewind is a weekly collection of notes and quotes from the Alabama football game of the weekend. October 21, 2007 The
textAfterTable: By the numbers A look at a few numbers from Alabama's 41-17 win over Tennessee. 30:51 Over the last three quarters (45 minutes of game-clock time), the Crimson Tide held the ball for 30:51. 1.000 Alabama batted 1.000 on red-zone scoring chances, cashing in on each of five trips inside the Tennessee 20. 185 DJ Hall's 185 receiving yards was a career high. 286 A whopping 286 of Alabama's 510 total yards came on first down. 2 How strong has Alabama's offense been of late? Punter P.J. Fitzgerald has punted only two times in each of UA's last two games. Shutterbug
